Check that the global options array is correctly parsed and that local values of the cell can still override a global option.

## Interactive

### Global
```{webr-r}
print("test")
```

### Local

```{webr-r}
#| comment: ""
print("test")
```


## Non-interactive

### Global
```{webr-r}
#| context: output
print("test")
```

### Local

```{webr-r}
#| context: output
#| comment: ""
print("test")
```
